Class ZigBeeApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bubblecloud.zigbee.ZigBeeApi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceListener, EndpointListener

    public class ZigBeeApi
extends java.lang.Object
implements EndpointListener, DeviceListener
    ZigBee Application Interface.
    Author:
    Tommi S.E. Laukkanen, Chris Hatton, Chris Jackson

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZigBeeApi

        public ZigBeeApi(ZigBeePort port,
         int pan,
         int channel,
         java.util.EnumSet<DiscoveryMode> discoveryModes,
         boolean resetNetwork)
        Constructor to configure the port interface.
        Parameters:
        port - the ZigBee interface port (reference implementation provided by the zigbee4java-serialPort module)
        pan - the pan
        channel - the channel
        discoveryModes - the discovery modes
        resetNetwork - the flag indicating network reset on startup

      • startup

        public boolean startup()
        Starts up network manager, network, context and discovery manager.
        Returns:
        true if startup was success.

        public boolean initializeHardware()
        Initialize the zigbee hardware

      • initializeNetwork

        public boolean initializeNetwork(boolean resetNetwork)
        Initializes the zigbee network. This is only required if the port is opened using initializeHardware
        Parameters:
        resetNetwork - true to reset the network to the current panid and channel
        Returns:

      • isInitialBrowsingComplete

        true if initial network browsing is complete.

      • permitJoin

        public boolean permitJoin(boolean joinState)
        Changes the permit join state.
        Parameters:
        joinState - boolean join state, true for enabled indefinitely, false for disabled
        Returns:
        true if success

      • permitJoin

        public boolean permitJoin(int durationSeconds)
        Changes the permit join state with a timeout duration.
        Parameters:
        durationSeconds - join duration in seconds, from 1-254
        Returns:
        true if success
